from pypdf import PdfReader, PdfWriter
import tempfile

def diagnose_pdf(pdf_path, start_page=1, end_page=None):
    """é€é¡µæå–å¹¶æµ‹è¯•æ¯ä¸€é¡µ"""
    reader = PdfReader(pdf_path)

        # åˆ›å»ºå•é¡µ PDF
        writer = PdfWriter()
        writer.add_page(reader.pages[page_num - 1])
